sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { X, Save, Package } from 'lucide-react'; const ProductModal = ({ isOpen, onClose, product = null, onSave }) => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: '', category: 'Clothing', sku: '', barcode: '', costPrice: '', sellingPrice: '', currentStock: '', minStock: '', supplier: '', description: '' }); const categories = ['Clothing', 'Perfume', 'Accessories', 'Other']; const suppliers = ['Fashion Wholesale Co.', 'Perfume Distributors Inc.', 'Accessory World']; useEffect(() => { if (product) { setFormData({ name: product.name || '', category: product.category || 'Clothing', sku: product.sku || '', barcode: product.barcode || '', costPrice: product.costPrice || '', sellingPrice: product.sellingPrice || '', currentStock: product.currentStock || '', minStock: product.minStock || '', supplier: product.supplier || '', description: product.description || '' }); } else { setFormData({ name: '', category: 'Clothing', sku: '', barcode: '', costPrice: '', sellingPrice: '', currentStock: '', minStock: '', supplier: '', description: '' }); } }, [product]); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); onSave(formData); onClose(); }; const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; if (!isOpen) return null; return (

{product ? 'Edit Product' : 'Add New Product'}
